thread.title: Technical Perspectives on Waste Management Stocks -- China Recycling Energy, Meridian Waste Solutions, Stericycle, and Covanta

author: cnbc.com
title: Technical Perspectives on Waste Management Stocks -- China Recycling Energy, Meridian Waste Solutions, Stericycle, and Covanta
text:
NEW YORK, March 22, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today, we are offering reports on CREG, MRDN, SRCL, and CVA which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . Pre-market today, WallStEquities.com reviews China Recycling Energy Corp. (NASDAQ: CREG), Meridian Waste Solutions Inc. (NASDAQ: MRDN), Stericycle Inc. (NASDAQ: SRCL), and Covanta Holding Corp. (NYSE: CVA). Companies in the Waste Management industry collect, treat, and dispose of garbage and other waste materials, recover reusable materials through recycling operations, and provide remediation services for decontaminating buildings, mine sites, soil, or groundwater. All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below.
www.wallstequities.com/registration
China Recycling Energy
Shares in Xi'an, China headquartered China Recycling Energy Corp. rose 2.13%, ending Wednesday's trading session at $1.92. The stock recorded a trading volume of 62,815 shares. The Company's shares have gained 19.25% over the past year. The stock is trading 1.53% above its 200-day moving average. Moreover, shares of the Company, which engages in the recycling energy business in China, have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 41.53. Get the full research report on CREG for free by clicking below at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=CREG
Meridian Waste Solutions
Milton, Georgia-based Meridian Waste Solutions Inc.'s stock declined 5.49%, closing the day at $0.63 with a total trading volume of 218,398 shares. The stock is trading 31.50% below their 50-day moving average. Shares of the Company, which through its subsidiaries, provides non-hazardous solid waste collection, transfer and disposal services, have an RSI of 34.20.
On March 07 th , 2018, Meridian Waste Solutions announced that its subsidiary, Attis Innovations, is featured in the March issue of Compounding World. The latest issue of the magazine is now available for viewing online. Access the free research report on MRDN now by signing up at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=MRDN
Stericycle
On Wednesday, shares in Lake Forest, Illinois-based Stericycle Inc. recorded a trading volume of 914,279 shares. The stock ended the day 0.96% lower at $61.69. The Company's shares are trading below their 50-day moving average by 10.23%. Furthermore, shares of Stericycle, which together with its subsidiaries, provides regulated and compliance solutions to the healthcare, retail, and commercial businesses in the US and internationally, have an RSI of 35.70. Are you already registered with Wall St. Equities? Do so now for free, and get the report on SRCL at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=SRCL
Covanta Holding
Morristown, New Jersey headquartered Covanta Holding Corp.'s stock rose 1.00%, finishing yesterday's session at $15.20 with a total trading volume of 699,945 shares. The stock is trading above their 200-day moving average by 1.39%. Shares of the Company, which through its subsidiaries, provides waste and energy services to municipal entities primarily in the US and Canada, have an RSI of 45.92.
On March 01 st , 2018, Covanta announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.25 per share, payable on April 06 th , 2018, to stockholders of record as of the close of business on March 29 th , 2018. Aspiring Member, please take a moment to register below for your free research report on CVA at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=CVA
--
